meanings.definition: Having failed to become what one might have been.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sense of manque when she saw her classmates achieving their dreams.
meanings.sent2: The man's manque ambition left him feeling unfulfilled.
meanings.sent3: His manque attempts at painting always ended up as messy blobs of color.
meanings.sent4: The garden, with its manque flowers, seemed to long for the sun's warmth.
meanings.sent5: The man's manque dreams haunted him in his sleep.

meanings.definition: A person who has failed to achieve a particular position or status.
meanings.sent1: She saw herself as a manque in the competitive world of business.
meanings.sent2: The manque actor never made it to the big screen.
meanings.sent3: The manque politician always had a smile on his face despite his setbacks.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with manque artists, each with their own story to tell.
meanings.sent5: The manque CEO watched as others climbed the corporate ladder.
